title: 1.6 Refreshing Data with setInterval()
description: The lesson covers on refreshing new data from the ISS API and updating the HTML DOM accordingly once per second with setInterval().

codeExamples.title: Where is the ISS?
codeExamples.description: Final version of the ISS app.

codeExamples.title: Centering Map on the ISS
codeExamples.description: (Exercise) Demonstration of centering the view of the map on the ISS.

codeExamples.title: Using p5.js + Mappa
codeExamples.description: (Exercise) Demonstration of drawing the marker image using p5.js.

codeExamples.title: Using p5.js + Mappa with Velocity
codeExamples.description: (Exercise) Demonstration of using p5.js to draw the ISS marker and its velocity vector.

codeExamples.title: Scaling Marker with Altitude
codeExamples.description: (Exercise) Demonstration of scaling the size of the marker according to the altitude of the ISS.

codeExamples.title: Scaling Marker with Zoom
codeExamples.description: (Exercise) Demonstration of scaling the size of the marker according to the zoom level.
